General.Name: Shan Dong Sun Paper Industry Joint Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Sunpaper Co., Ltd. engages in production and sale of paper products in China and internationally. It offers offset papers; cultural paper, including double-adhesive paper and coated paper; packaging paper, which include kraft board, and corrugated base paper; coated base paper; fast-moving consumer products, which comprise household paper and wet wipes; special industrial paper; and wood pulp products, comprising dissolving pulp, chemical pulp, and chemical mechanical pulp. The company also exports its products. Shandong Sunpaper Co., Ltd. is based in Jining, China.

4.Name: Mr. Chuanshun  Pang
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
